title: Rito Towers (Issue 1 Part 1) [Comic]
body:
I've been wanting to make a animated cartoon centralized around League for a while but I'm too poor and stupid to do so. So, I kept my chin up and did the next best thing, make a comic. So, enjoy the first part of Rito Towers. A story that takes place in an parallel universe where the champions manage Riot (Rito) Games and the rioters have become the champions. I'll try to pump one part out every week if people end up wanting more. Tell me what you think of part 1!  
*(edit: Damn dood! Didn't my stuff was THIS good. Well, I'm honoured to be on the post of the day twice. More will be coming soon.) *

replies.body: LMAO. I love it. Beautifurr, beautifurr. I can def see this as an animated cartoon, haha. Make more please! I enjoy reading them. (dat sion doe.)
If only I had the knowledge of animation. Maybe later on down the road. In the mean time, I'm glad you like em!
Honestly, I like the stick figures. Great job!
How will you deal with Ryze and Tyndamere though since Riot employees have the names of them.
I guess we'll see when the time comes.
Great job! This made me laugh so hard xD
This is like South Park brilliant. KEEP GOING!!! (or else?)
Well, since you talked me into it.
